body.name: Blue Diamond Cookware Tri-Ply Stainless Steel Ceramic Nonstick, 8" Frying Pan Skillet, PFAS-Free, Multi Clad, Induction, Dishwasher Safe, Oven Safe, Silver

FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Blue Diamond Triple Steel features all the benefits of multi-layer stainless steel heating, with all the ease of ceramic nonstick!
These three-layer tri-ply stainless steel bodies deliver even heating and incredible browning, searing, and sauteing results.
Metal utensil safe, Blue Diamond’s diamond-infused coating is 5x harder and 10x longer lasting than traditional nonstick, and best of all they are toxin free! No PFAS, PFOA, lead, or cadmium!
Suitable for all cooktops, and optimized for induction stovetops
Mirror-finished bodies are extra durable and oven and broiler safe up to 600°F. Glass lids are oven safe up to 425°F
V-shaped cutouts keep the stainless steel handles cool, and the angled shape allow the pans stack and save space.
body.description: Shine on the stovetop with Blue Diamond’s Triple Steel collection. Blue Diamond Triple Steel features two stainless steel layers surrounding an aluminum core that extends throughout the pan to deliver responsive performance with unbelievable power. Our unique Midnight Diamond coating is an eye-catching update that works with the 3-ply body to promote fast and even heating, incredible durability, and dazzling results on all stovetops, including induction. Metal utensil safe, Blue Diamond’s diamond-infused coating is 5x harder and 10x longer lasting than traditional nonstick, and best of all they are toxin free! No PFAS, PFOA, lead, or cadmium! The stainless steel V-cutout handles keep the collection comfortable on the stovetop while their unique angle makes these pans stackable for easy storage. Glass lids provide an easy view at any meal in progress and optimal for steaming and grease protection. Dishwasher safe. Oven safe to 600°F, glass lids to 425°F.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BLUE DIAMOND TRIPLE STEEL DIAMOND-INFUSED CERAMIC NONSTICK COOKWARE

THE NEW STANDARD IN STAINLESS STEEL BLUE DIAMOND TRIPLE STEEL Triple Steel features two stainless steel layers surrounding an aluminum core that extends throughout the pan to deliver responsive performance with unbelievable power. Featuring a unique Midnight Diamond coating, this eye-catching update works with the triple layer body to ensure fast and even heating, incredible durability, and dazzling results. Plus, it's toxin-free (no PFAS, PFOA, lead, or cadmium) so you can cook without worry.
SEE BLUE DIAMOND TRIPLE STEEL IN ACTION! THE NEWEST STANDARD IN NONSTICK, TOXIN-FREE COOKWARE!

Previous page METAL UTENSIL SAFE MIDNIGHT DIAMOND NONSTICK This new coating works with the triple layer stainless steel body to deliver incredible performance THREE LAYERS OF POWER TRIPLE LAYER STAINLESS STEEL The aluminum core extends up the walls of the pan, so you can cook without worrying about cold spots STACKING STAY-COOL HANDLE SAVE SPACE IN YOUR CABINETS The frying pans and wok stack to save space while the v-shaped cutout helps all of them stay cool OVEN SAFE UP TO 425°F DURABLE GLASS LIDS Tight-fitting glass lids seal in moisture while offering a quick look at your meal MADE FOR DAILY USE DISHWASHER & OVEN SAFE Designed for daily life, these pans wipe clean, are dishwasher safe, and oven safe up to 600°F Next page 1 ENHANCED CERAMIC NONSTICK 2 FAST & EVEN HEATING 3 STAY-COOL STACKING 4 DURABLE GLASS LIDS 5 DISHWASHER & OVEN SAFE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, the non-stick surface is awesome. Cleaning is a breeze

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Frying Pan
reviews.reviewText: I pay attention to build quality on products I buy, and this pan is off the charts excellent! I like that I can use metal utensils, it's dishwasher safe, and oven safe up to a 600-degree broiler. Honestly though, I usually hand wash the skillet, which takes no more than 30–60 seconds. Heat distribution seems very even. My only knock, if you can even call it that, is that the non-stick surface is so slick that I have to chase my eggs around the pan with my spatula in order to flip them. I'll take that any day! I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 8-inch Pan, Uses Less Energy to Cook
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE THIS PAN! I was skeptical that it would work on my induction cooktop despite other reviewers saying it does. I have a 10-inch blue diamond pan that does not work with induction.I compared the symbols underneath both pans and this 8-inch pan has the "coil" symbol in addition to other cooking symbols that my old 10-inch pan has. I noticed it working so well with induction that I set the power level at 2.5 instead of 3.0 to cook an egg in a couple drops of olive oil to make an egg-muffin. The pan is heavy enough to sit level even when empty. When I remove the egg from the pan, the pan looks clean.I think other reviewers saying the pan burns, are just using too much heat or cooking for too long. This little pan cooks faster than the small cast-iron pan I was using. It looks good, cooks efficiently and saves energy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pan, for the most part
reviews.reviewText: Very durable and well-made - it feels solid and weighty in hand. Cleaning is a breeze as nothing sticks to it after I'm done cooking in it. However, WHILE I'm cooking eggs in it, they tend to stick. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific for All Egg Dishes!
reviews.reviewText: We have tried many small skillets because we love egg dishes for breakfast. This is the best. The surface is truly nonstick and extremely easy to clean. The weight is perfect. The heat conduction is even and relaible. We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very favorably impressed! Not only is the weight distribution excellent, the cooking is even. I liked it so much, I purchased another skillet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good but only while they last
reviews.reviewText: I bought both the 9.5 inch and 11 inch as a set about 15 months ago and within a year, the paint is chipping off where the bolts are that attach the handle to the pan. Also the finish is starting to come off in the bigger pan and food sticks in the smaller pan. I have always used them on low heat, never rinsed or washed them until they are completely cool. Always hand wash and have only used a soft sponge on them. These are just not built to last very long. Upset that I spent this much money on them to see them fail like this. I reached out to the company to ask them if they'd be willing to replace the pans and I'd change my review on here. Until then I'm warning people not to buy these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice little pan
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little pan for omelettes, which is why I purchased. Very smooth interior and exterior, so it’s easy to clean. Great release!

Estoy usando esta sartén alrededor de tres meses!Mi resumen: Es ideal (al menos para mí 😁)!Lo elegí por las siguientes razones:1.Es 💯 de acero inoxidable, y NO tiene ninguna capa de aluminio.2.No tiene Teflon, ni cobertura antiadherente.3.Tiene la cobertura de cerámica.Cumplió todas mis expectativas.Quiero decir que se puede freír con esa sartén sin aceite.Me encanta el arroz, ragú de vegetales, y las hojuelas los que preparo con esa sartén.Es súper facilísimo de limpiarlo: agua tibia, esponja (sin parte que raya) y un poquito de jabón (si quieres limpiarlo a 💯), ni siquiera hay que tallarlo, todo se quita por si solo y bien rápido.Después de esa sartén me compré kit de las mismas 😁🙏☺️Lo recomiendo ampliamente!

reviews.reviewTitle: Real TriPly pan, not just on bottom
reviews.reviewText: I've been using it twice a day for over a week and this is a great pan. Nothing sticks to it, cleaning it is a simple wipe with a paper towel and a quick rinse. It feels like a pan should. To work properly a pan needs mass. This has it and the multi ply metal goes all the way to the rim. All my other "unscratchable' pans had fine scratches within a few days, this one still looks like the day it was delivered! I've already bought another one (larger). I don't know if it is the diamond dust in the coating but it works. A bit expensive but quality always is. Get one of these, you won't regret it!
It is an excellent frypan. I like the way it can go from stove to oven. The easiest ever to clean up.
Absolutely the BEST non stick pan I've ever had . Well made , good looking , and super easy to clean .

Eine sehr gute Pfanne, die definitiv hält, was sie verspricht. Schöne Keramik, Griff lässt die Pfanne gut in der Hand liegen und wackelt nicht. Kann auch in den Backofen geschoben werden. So zufrieden, dass ich die Pfanne gleich in einer weiteren Größe nachbestellt habe. Daumen hoch.
